title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V2\BatchRecognizeRequest
name: BatchRecognizeRequest
description:
Request message for the [BatchRecognize][google.cloud.speech.v2.Speech.BatchRecognize] method.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v2.BatchRecognizeRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.recognizer
params.description: Required. Resource name of the recognizer to be used for ASR.

params.name: data.config
params.description: Features and audio metadata to use for the Automatic Speech Recognition. This field in combination with the [config_mask][google.cloud.speech.v2.BatchRecognizeRequest.config_mask] field can be used to override parts of the [default_recognition_config][google.cloud.speech.v2.Recognizer.default_recognition_config] of the Recognizer resource.

params.name: data.config_mask
params.description: The list of fields in [config][google.cloud.speech.v2.BatchRecognizeRequest.config] that override the values in the [default_recognition_config][google.cloud.speech.v2.Recognizer.default_recognition_config] of the recognizer during this recognition request. If no mask is provided, all given fields in [config][google.cloud.speech.v2.BatchRecognizeRequest.config] override the values in the recognizer for this recognition request. If a mask is provided, only the fields listed in the mask override the config in the recognizer for this recognition request. If a wildcard (*) is provided, [config][google.cloud.speech.v2.BatchRecognizeRequest.config] completely overrides and replaces the config in the recognizer for this recognition request.

params.name: data.files
params.description: Audio files with file metadata for ASR.
